descr: "Actual or  potential/avoided event causing unintended physical injury resulting from or contributed to by medical care, a research study or other healthcare setting factors that requires additional monitoring, treatment, or hospitalization, or that results in death."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a AdverseEvent resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "The identifier(s) of this adverse event that are assigned by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itsefl is not appropriate."

fields.name: category
fields.descr: "The type of event which is important to characterize what occurred and caused harm to the subject, or had the potential to cause harm to the subject."

fields.name: _category
fields.descr: "Extensions for category"

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "This element defines the specific type of event that occurred or that was prevented from occurring."

fields.name: subject
fields.descr: "This subject or group impacted by the event.  With a prospective adverse event, there will be no subject as the adverse event was prevented."

fields.name: date
fields.descr: "The date (and perhaps time) when the adverse event occurred."

fields.name: _date
fields.descr: "Extensions for date"

fields.name: reaction
fields.descr: "Includes information about the reaction that occurred as a result of exposure to a substance (for example, a drug or a chemical)."

fields.name: location
fields.descr: "The information about where the adverse event occurred."

fields.name: seriousness
fields.descr: "Describes the seriousness or severity of the adverse event."

fields.name: outcome
fields.descr: "Describes the type of outcome from the adverse event."

fields.name: recorder
fields.descr: "Information on who recorded the adverse event.  May be the patient or a practitioner."

fields.name: eventParticipant
fields.descr: "Parties that may or should contribute or have contributed information to the Act. Such information includes information leading to the decision to perform the Act and how to perform the Act (e.g. consultant), information that the Act itself seeks to reveal (e.g. informant of clinical history), or information about what Act was performed (e.g. informant witness)."

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "Describes the adverse event in text."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"

fields.name: suspectEntity
fields.descr: "Describes the entity that is suspected to have caused the adverse event."

fields.name: subjectMedicalHistory
fields.descr: "AdverseEvent.subjectMedicalHistory."

fields.name: referenceDocument
fields.descr: "AdverseEvent.referenceDocument."

fields.name: study
fields.descr: "AdverseEvent.study."
